p: NPK increased growth and rhizome yield of turmeric compared with PM. Although PM had been reported to increase growth and yield of crops [ 21], the elemental quantity of N, P, and K in NPK fertilizer was higher than that of PM, which may explain the yield differences between NPK and PM. Turmeric is a high nutrient demanding crop; in this regard, [ 35] obtained good yields of turmeric rhizomes with the combination of 375, 175, and 237.5â€‰kg of N, P 2O 5, and K 2O, respectively.
